name: KraftVein
description:
Welcome to KraftVein!
  • Build a house (or just a shed)
  • Craft axes, bombs, robots (if you're into that) and more!
  • Grow a garden and forage goodies
  • Combine ingredients to create foods with special effects
  • Explore the caves and fight spooky monsters (Just don't delve to deep)!

 ~ Supports multiple save files ~
